definitions: denoting a deep inarticulate sound conveying pain, despair, pleasure, etc.

examples.text: he made groaning sounds and took labored breaths
I flopped back, making a small tortured groaning noise

shortDefinitions: denoting deep inarticulate sound conveying pain, despair, pleasure

definitions: denoting a low creaking sound made by an object under pressure

examples.text: the pillar gave a huge groaning noise and crumbled

shortDefinitions: denoting low creaking sound made by object under pressure

examples.text: a groaning table of rich food
the groaning shelves of novelty Christmas releases
